application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Mountain View, CA, USA; Chicago, IL, USA; New York, NY, USA
description:
gTech’s Professional Services team takes a creative, collaborative, and customer-centric approach to provide foundational services and forward-looking business solutions to top advertiser and publisher customers. Through technical implementation, optimization, and key solutions, gTech Professional Services helps customers attain their business goals while building long-term capabilities.

As an Mobile UX Technical Specialist, you are an expert in mobile user experience and conversion rate optimization (CRO). You will analyze customers' mobile sites, deep dive into their analytics data, identify areas for improvement, provide recommendations for A/B testing and support customers as they deploy the tests. You will help companies adopt a testing culture and use data to create better user experiences for the customers and drive more conversions. You will play a key role in improving mobile sites through scaled initiatives, materials and tools.

Google creates products and services that make the world a better place, and gTech’s role is to help bring them to life. Our teams of solution-oriented trusted advisors support millions of customers globally. Our solutions are rooted in our technical skill, product expertise, and a thorough understanding of our customers’ complex needs. Whether the answer is a bespoke solution to solve a unique problem, or a new tool that can scale across Google, everything we do aims to ensure our customers benefit from the full potential of Google products.

To learn more about gTech, check out our video.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Experience with mobile user experience (UX) and website conversions (CRO).
  • Experience working with and managing external partners and/or customers.
  • Ability to travel as required.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in prototyping and A/B Testing.
  • Experience with HTML, CSS, AMP and PWA.
  • Knowledge of Google Analytics or similar tools.
  • Ability to adapt your message to the technical level of the audience and comfort presenting data driven materials to groups of any size and background.
  • Knowledge of the major tools and technologies used by and the challenges facing web developers. Excellent problem solving and analytical skills.
  • Excellent project management skills and attention to detail. Ability to work well in a fast-paced, cross-functional team environment.
responsibilities:
• Consult with Google’s largest customers to provide specific, data-informed and actionable advice to improve mobile site conversion rates and business results. Focus on user behavior to advise usability/UX improvement ideas.
  • Analyze customer analytics data to show differences in user behavior on different screens in order to optimize client assets. Support usability/UX audits with client's own data.
  • Consult with internal account management teams, partner teams and customers to track the progress and impact.
  • Advocate new product features and assist clients in the adoption of new products to help them build long-term success. Improve product offerings by providing client feedback on features to Google product managers and engineers.
  • Review current processes and develop processes and workflows to increase team productivity and efficiency.
title: Technical Specialist, Mobile Web UX, gTech
